ygData.subject: Re: Hey John!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Frosty is level 19, yup. Everytime i gain a bit of exp with him, I always end up dying and losing it all. I m just under a bubb with him now. ... Yeah,
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 1 Jun 1999, Zwanenburg, John wrote:

> What level is frostan?

Frosty is level 19, yup. Everytime i gain a bit of exp with him, I always
end up dying and losing it all. I'm just under a bubb with him now.

> Hrm we could play together with those two if you want to.

Yeah, that sounds like a great plan. Too bad you get on *so* late at night
though! If you wouldn't mind, I'll bring an enchantress friend along.
She's going to be Frizzan's wife eventually. Hehe ;) She was level 21
yesterday, but with the exp formula, a few levels is just a percentage or
two differnce with split.

We were talking about going to lake rathe to get another friend some small
bronze, but we must outfit the tank first and formost :)

> Oh and about that armor , sorry man i
> thougt i told you but i gave one set to a good friend of mine and the other
> was bought as well....

You might've when i was zoning or something.. Because i did catch you on
once or twice, bbut was always travelling, and you know how that goes.
Nooooo problem about the armor. Good friends always come before the just
met friends. I'd do the same thing :)

Nick
